title: Problem 2150_A
statement: Rymdkraft - Rymdsylt⠀Hacks are disabled in this problem.There is a strip containing 10^9 cells, numbered from 1 to 10^9. Each cell is either black or white. Initially, m distinct cells a_1, a_2, ..., a_m are black, and the others are white.If a person is on some cell x, he might be given two types of commands: \texttt{A}: jump to the next cell, i.e. cell x + 1; \texttt{B}: jump to the next white cell, i.e. the minimum y > x such that cell y is white.
